project_descr:
Community-Based Agriculture and Rural Development - East (CBARD-E)
To prove the viability of high-value agricultural-based interventions in improving local economies in Nangarhar as a sustainable alternative to illicit crop cultivation.

outputs.output_descr: To prove the viability of high-value agricultural-based interventions in improving local economies in Uruzgan, Ningarhar and Kandahar provinces a sustainable alternative to illicit crop cultivation.
To prove the viability of high-value agricultural-based interventions in improving local economies in Farah and Badghis as a sustainable alternative to illicit crop cultivation.

project_title: community-based agriculture and rural development - east (cbard-e)
